parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
The instance ID.

> If you set this parameter to the ID of a sharded cluster instance, you must also specify the **NodeId** parameter.

parameters.name: Database
parameters.description: The name of the database to be queried. By default, all databases are queried.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The end of the time range to query. The end time must be later than the start time. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

> The end time must be within 24 hours from the start time. Otherwise, the query fails.

parameters.name: Form
parameters.description:
The form of the audit log that the operation returns. Valid values:

*   **File**: triggers the generation of audit logs. If this parameter is set to File, only common parameters are returned.
*   **Stream** (default): returns data streams.

parameters.name: LogicalOperator
parameters.description:
The logical relationship between multiple keywords. Valid values:

*   **or**
*   **and** (default value)

parameters.name: NodeId
parameters.description:
The ID of the mongos node or shard node in the instance.

> This parameter takes effect only when you set the **DBInstanceId** parameter to the ID of a sharded cluster instance.

parameters.name: OrderType
parameters.description:
The order of time in which the log entries to return are sorted. Valid values:

*   **asc**: The log entries are sorted by time in ascending order.
*   **desc**: The log entries are sorted by time in descending order.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number of the page to return. The valid value must be a positive integer that does not exceed the maximum value of the INTEGER data type. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return per page. Default value: 30. Valid values: **30**, **50**, and **100**.

parameters.name: QueryKeywords
parameters.description: The keywords used for query. You can enter up to 10 keywords at a time. If you enter multiple keywords, separate the keywords with spaces.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: User
parameters.description: The user of the database. If you do not specify this parameter, this operation returns records of all users.
